subtitle.Text: Hi, I'm Steve Gaynor, I'm the co-founder of the Fullbright Company, we made Gone Home.
I was the writer and designer, and thank you for taking a look at our commentary mode.
Whenever you find an icon like the one you just clicked on, you can find out a little bit more about the game.
I want to thank everybody who's added commentary, Johnnemann and Karla, my co-founders of the company, Kate Craig, our 3D Artist, Chris Remo, our composer,
Sarah Grayson, the voice of Sam Greenbriar, and Corin Tucker, the lead singer of Heavens to Betsy and Sleater-Kinney and other awesome bands.
So thank you everybody, and enjoy commentary mode!
